abstract: MTV will begin airing a reality TV show based on the Occupy Wall Street protests at Zuccotti Park in Manhattan.
snippet: MTV will begin airing a reality TV show based on the Occupy Wall Street protests at Zuccotti Park in Manhattan.
lead_paragraph: MTV will air a reality TV show based on the Occupy Wall Street protests at Zuccotti Park. Brian Stelter, The New York Times media reporter, said on Twitter that an episode of the "True Life" series, "True Life: I'm Occupying Wall Street," would appear on Nov. 5. There was a casting call for one of the protesters to appear, Entertainment Weekly reported. Read more ».

headline.main: At Occupy Wall Street, Reality TV Imitates ... Reality
